title: Life.Goes.On.Done.to.Death-PROPHET
description:
Life Goes On: Done to Death
(c) Infinite Monkeys Entertainment Ltd

release date: August 2769
protection: Steam
# of discs: 1
languages: EN/DE/FR/ES/PL/RU/NL/JP
Life Goes On: Done to Death is a comically-morbid
platformer where you guide heroic knights to their
demise and use the dead bodies to solve puzzles
Wanting to live forever, a mighty king sends his
army of knights to find the Cup of Life. On this
quest, you will summon knight after knight to be
brutally sacrificed. Impale knights on spikes to
create a safe path. Catch a knight on a sawblade to
land the body on a button. Freeze knights into
blocks of ice to reach higher ground

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
The game is updated to v2.02, language can be
changed in the Options menu
